black sheep: one day i gave up my hope no one was on my side i was not strong enough i was on no ones mind  bleeding from all of you no one noticed me meaningless for everyone i just wanted to  shout out loud out of my mind  to trust in me is everything i can ever do i can ever do so please oh please dont break the trust in me  you want me to be like you nothing else counts i was not strong enough i was on no ones mind  bleeding from all of you no one noticed me meaningless for everyone i just wanted to  shout out loud out of my mind  to trust in me...
